UPDATE member SET mhospitallike =
CASE WHEN mhospitallike IS NULL OR mhospitallike = '' THEN #{hospitalName} ELSE CONCAT(mhospitallike,',',#{hospitalName}) END
CASE WHEN mhospitallike LIKE CONCAT('%', ',', #{hospitalDelName}, '%') THEN REPLACE(mhospitallike, CONCAT(',', #{hospitalDelName}), '') WHEN mhospitallike LIKE CONCAT('%', #{hospitalDelName},',','%') THEN REPLACE(mhospitallike, CONCAT(#{hospitalDelName}, ','), '') ELSE REPLACE(mhospitallike, #{hospitalDelName}, '') END
WHERE mno = #{mno}
